<h1
  className={"openapi__heading"}
>
  Delete a check by its id.
</h1>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/report/check/{check_id}"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

Delete a check by its id.

## Request
